WorkItem.Description:
Discussions : 
http://chirpy.codeplex.com/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=217629

- Add checkbox in configuration (Convert image in css to base 64)
-- This option run on chirp.css file
- Create 2 version css :one regular (ie.min.css), one convert (min.css)

Exemple regex:
\s*url\(\s*["']?([^"']+)[".']?\s*\);
WorkItem.Summary: Convert any image into a base64 string in CSS

Comments.Message:
Hey Francis,

Maybe we should also allow users to do this in the config files? That might make more sense? ImagesToBase64="true" or something? I'm fine keeping it as a feature of the individual files as well, but it should def be turned off by default.

Microsoft release : 
The ASP.NET Sprite Control and framework
http://aspnet.codeplex.com/releases/view/50140
